description:
Currently qemu-system-arm or qemu-system-aarch64 need '-bios ROM.bin' for booting from uefi rom,
unfortunately nova-compute can't build the parameter for qumu via libvirt.

The patch in below link can support this function, and I have verified that it can launch one instance
which is run from uefi rom.


       http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~ming/others/os-uefi-cmdline.patch
title: nova doesn't support to launch instance booted from uefi rom for AARCH64/ARM

comments.content:
Currently qemu-system-arm or qemu-system-aarch64 need '-bios ROM.bin' for booting from uefi rom,
unfortunately nova-compute can't build the parameter for qumu via libvirt.

The patch in below link can support this function, and I have verified that it can launch one instance
which is run from uefi rom.


       http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~ming/others/os-uefi-cmdline.patch
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tom-leiming

comments.content: Would you like to submit the patch your self? We use gerrit (review.openstack.org) for patch submissions.   http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/CONTRIBUTING.rst
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/215414
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Lack of support for a feature is not a bug, this required a blueprint for mitaka.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
There was already a patch proposed for this in May:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/185129/

And that team is proposing a blueprint for mitaka so work with them.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Blueprint defined in:
https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/boot-from-uefi
Please subscribe to join efforts and get this ready for mitaka release.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mrkzmrkz

comments.content:
@Marcos
Thanks! Let's have some discussion on the mitaka summit. :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~shuquan

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Shuquan Huang (huang.shuquan@99cloud.net) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/215414
Reason: It'll be a joint effort on this bp in the M release.
https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/boot-from-uefi
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Hello shuquan,
There's a spec draft I would really like you to review (already added you as reviewer), so we can keep the progress in this effort:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/235983/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mrkzmrkz

comments.content:
As already described in comments #3 and #5 this is a feature request
and not a bug. I'm closing this bug report as "Invalid".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
